text: Write down three specific self-care goals for the month and post them where you’ll see them.
Spend some time in nature today. Whether it’s taking a walk, smelling the flowers, or sitting by a tree, nature can make you feel calmer.
Check in on your own mental health. Take a mental health test at mhascreening.org.
Try sharing your mental health story on social media or with close friends to reduce stigma.
Move your body in a way that feels right for you. Physical health supports mental health.
Do a hobby you enjoy or try a new one to unwind and relax.
Practice good sleep habits. Aim for 8 hours of quality rest.
Create a calm space at home with things that make you feel relaxed.
Reflect on causes you care about and think of ways to support them.
Spend 10 minutes journaling about how you feel today.
Send a thank-you message to someone who has helped you recently.
Declutter your space by donating old items. A clear space helps clear your mind.
Try a deep breathing exercise: inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4.
Read this affirmation: 'We’re all first-time humans. Give yourself grace.'
Take action for mental health awareness in your community.
Go somewhere new today — even a small change can refresh your mind.
Spend time with a pet to lower stress and boost your mood.
Stay hydrated! Aim for 64 ounces of water today.
Reconnect with someone you miss — call or meet them.
Take a full rest without feeling guilty. You deserve it.
Try a new coping skill today, like meditation or progressive relaxation.
Support a cause you care about with your time or donations.
Reflect on what boundaries you need for peace and communicate them.
Spend time connecting with your spirituality if that feels right for you.
Attend a local community event and meet new people.
Plan a get-together with loved ones — connection boosts happiness.
Express creativity — paint, write, cook, or make something new.
Ask someone how they’re really feeling today.
Make a list of your strengths and celebrate them.
Plan a small break or a short staycation to recharge.
Write a letter to yourself celebrating your progress this month.
